QuestData.Title: No Stone Unbroken
QuestData.Description:
When the warring clans came into the Vale, the Baruk deigned themselves worthy to lay claim to the ancient grounds of Guo-Lai.
They are not.
Show these usurpers their place, and you may earn a modicum of favor with the Rajani.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Baruk mogu in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
